hero.title: Exclusive Star Experiences
hero.subtitle: Go beyond video messages. Engage with your favorite stars in unique and interactive ways.

experiences.title: Live Q&A Session
experiences.description: Join an exclusive group Q&A session with a star. Ask your burning questions and hear their insights live.

experiences.title: Virtual Meet & Greet
experiences.description: A private, one-on-one video call with your chosen celebrity. A truly personal and memorable interaction.

experiences.title: Online Gaming Session
experiences.description: Challenge your favorite gamer celebrity or influencer to an online match or play alongside them.

experiences.title: Virtual Cooking/Skill Class
experiences.description: Learn a new recipe or skill directly from a celebrity chef or expert in a live virtual class.

experiences.title: Behind-the-Scenes Access
experiences.description: Get an exclusive peek into a day in the life of a star, or a virtual tour of their set/studio.

experiences.title: Custom Experience Request
experiences.description: Have a unique idea for an interaction? Propose a custom experience (subject to star approval and pricing).

cta.title: Looking for Something Else?
cta.description: Our stars are always coming up with new ways to connect. Check back often or browse by star to see what's available!
